name: Bread

pages.text: Bread is the processed form of the various grain crops, such as $(l:mechanics/crops#barley)Barley$(). Breaking a grain crop drops a raw, unprocessed grain item, which is not useful on its own. It must be processed into $(thing)Bread$(), which can then be eaten or used in $(l:mechanics/sandwiches)Sandwiches$().
First, cut the straw off of the food with a $(thing)Knife$().

Grains are the longest-lasting stage of the process, decaying much slower than most foods. On its own, a fresh piece of grain lasts 10 months and 7 days. In a small vessel, it lasts 1 year, 9 months, and 7 days.
Grain must then be ground in a $(l:mechanics/quern)Quern$() to make flour.
Dough is crafted by adding a bucket of $(thing)Fresh Water$() to flour.
Dough is then able to be $(l:mechanics/heating)heated$() to make bread. At this point it can also be used in $(l:mechanics/sandwiches)Sandwiches$().
